General.Name: Lassila & Tikanoja Oyj
General.Description: Lassila & Tikanoja Oyj, a service company, provides environmental management, and property and plant support services in Finland, Sweden, and internationally. It operates in four segments: Environmental Services, Industrial Services, Facility Services Finland, and Facility Services Sweden. The company offers support, cleaning, and technical services, as well as property maintenance and energy efficiency services. It also provides waste management and recycling, and circular economy services; and process cleaning, sewer maintenance, hazardous waste management, and environmental construction services. Lassila & Tikanoja Oyj was founded in 1905 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
